TITLE: Hertz shares surge more than 50% after Bill Ackman takes big stake in rental car firm
SUMMARY: Shares of Hertz surged 56% Wednesday after a regulatory filing revealed Pershing Square had built a 4.1% position as of the end of 2024.

TITLE: More than 60% of CEOs expect a recession in the next 6 months as tariff turmoil grows, survey says
SUMMARY: A rising share of America's top executives sees a recessionary period on the horizon.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts find these 3 stocks attractive in these challenging times
SUMMARY: TipRanks' analyst ranking service highlights three stocks favored by the Street's top pros, including Affirm Holdings and TJX Companies.

TITLE: Third Point, D.E. Shaw obtain agreements with CoStar. How the activists can build value
SUMMARY: Third Point and D.E. Shaw are like-minded investors obtaining separate agreements with CoStar.

TITLE: Retail investors are running head first into this topsy-turvy market
SUMMARY: While the stock market whipsawed over recent days, average Joe traders saw an opportunity to buy the dip.

TITLE: Trump's triple-digit tariff essentially cuts off most trade with China, says economist
SUMMARY: President Trump's tariff increase on imports from China would basically end most trade between that country and the U.S., according to economist Erica York.

TITLE: Crypto-focused Janover skyrockets after completing its first Solana purchase
SUMMARY: Earlier this week, Janover announced new leadership and introduced a treasury management strategy focused on acquiring Solana.

TITLE: Trump's 'buy' call nets huge returns for those who listened
SUMMARY: CNBC calculated how much well-known holdings rallied between when Trump posted and session highs.

TITLE: United Airlines, Microchip Technology lead the stocks posting 20%-plus reversals on Trump tariff pause
SUMMARY: More than a dozen companies swung more than 20% from their lows to their highs in Wednesday's furious rally.

TITLE: Bill Ackman praises Trump's tariff pause: 'Thank you on behalf of all Americans'
SUMMARY: "Thank you on behalf of all Americans," Ackman wrote in a post on social media platform X. Shortly after, he added, "[Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent] rocks!"

TITLE: Jenny Harrington: The basics of income investing, and why it's especially important now in this turbulent market
SUMMARY: This is an excerpt from the book, "Dividend Investing: Dependable Income to Navigate All Market Environments," by Jenny Van Leeuwen Harrington.

TITLE: How much do stocks have to drop before trading is halted? The details on market 'circuit breakers'
SUMMARY: When stock prices and stock futures fall rapidly in a single session, exchanges implement halts in trading to allow a moment for cooler heads to prevail.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these 3 dividend stocks for income investors
SUMMARY: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Rithm Capital and Darden Restaurants.

TITLE: Trump says tariffs will accelerate reshoring, but experts say it's not that easy
SUMMARY: President Donald Trump may hope his tariffs bring manufacturing and jobs to the U.S., but the reality is not so simple, according to experts.

TITLE: Engaged Capital and Yeti reach a key agreement. Here are three ways to create shareholder value
SUMMARY: The firm and the company seem to have an amicable and constructive relationship, but there are still opportunities for value creation.

TITLE: SEC clarifies that most stablecoins are not securities
SUMMARY: The Securities and Exchange Commission issued guidance on Friday, clarifying that it does not view stablecoins in the most traditional sense as securities.

TITLE: Emerging markets fund posts worst session since March 2020 due to tariff fears
SUMMARY: The iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF (EEM) headed for its worst session since 2020 on Friday amid rising fears from Trump's tariffs.

TITLE: Treasury Secretary Bessent says market woes are more about tech stock sell-off than Trump's tariffs
SUMMARY: "The Nasdaq peaked on DeepSeek day so that's a Mag 7 problem, not a MAGA problem," Bessent said.

TITLE: Cliff Asness's AQR multi-strategy hedge fund returns 9% in the first quarter during tough conditions
SUMMARY: The Apex strategy from Cliff Asness' firm, which combines stocks, macro and arbitrage trades with $3 billion in assets under management, gained 9% in Q1.
